description: An MCP server that provides access to personal financial data from Monarch Money, allowing users to retrieve account information, transactions, budgets, goals, and net worth through natural language queries.

MONARCH_MFA_SECRET.description: Your Monarch Money MFA secret key (a string like 'T5SPVJIBRNPNNINFSH5W7RFVF2XYADYX')

MONARCH_FORCE_LOGIN.description: Set to 'true' to force a fresh login if needed

name: Monarch Money MCP
